name: intro-node
description: Welcome to this introductory course on Node.js! In this course, you will learn what Node.js is, its history, and how to install it. You will also learn how to create a Command Line Interface (CLI), what are npm and modules, the different types of modules available, how to interact with files, how to download modules using npm, how to write tests with Jest, and how to create an HTTP server, handle requests, and serve a simple website. All of these topics will be taught in the context of building a CLI-based note-taking app, along with a simple website to demonstrate the concepts.
